metadata.title: Trends Frozen, Anna and Snow Queen Elsa Poster, 24-Inch by 36-Inch
description: 24" X 36" high quality paper posters provide a low cost alternative to more expensive forms of wall art. Posters once mounted are suitable for framing and add are a great addition to any wall decor.
